title: [Gameplay] Betttelcast Alpha Skarner voice bug
body: First of all sorry for bad engilsh, i still learn the language. So the legendary Skraner randomly uses, the basic Skarner's quotes. Sometimes is says the only legendary quotes, sometimes only the classic, and sometimes both (first the basic then the legedary). As i noticed it happens only in case of movement quotes. I play on EUNE, engilsh game language. Fix my favorite robo-scropion please! :)
